ygData.subject: Re: starting a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Look, troll regeneration is nice, but your gonna need a healer anyways. Make an ogre, compare stats... And put all your skill points in agility ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Look, troll regeneration is nice, but your gonna need a healer anyways. Make
an ogre, compare stats...
And put all your skill points in agility
